title: Final hours: Save $200 on Apple's M4 Mac mini (24GB, 512GB), now $799
description: B&H is ousting Amazon during Prime Day for the lowest price on Apple's M4 Mac mini with a bump up to 24GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. Grab a flash deal zone before it ends tonight.Grab flash savings on Apple's upgraded Mac mini today only.The Prime Day special is in the form of a $100 instant rebate stacked with a $100 coupon discount in-cart when you shop at Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo. With the combined savings totaling $200 off, B&H's flash deal delivers the lowest M4 Mac mini price available on the upgraded spec (part number MCYT4LL/A) at $799.Save $200 on M4 Mac mini 24GB/512GB Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: B&H is ousting Amazon during Prime Day for the lowest price on Apple's M4 Mac mini with a bump up to 24GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. Grab a flash deal zone before it ends tonight.
text: Thu Jul 10 2025, 05:24 PM EDT · 1 minute read Grab flash savings on Apple's upgraded Mac mini today only. If you buy through our links, we may get a commission. Read our ethics policy. B&H is ousting Amazon during Prime Day for the lowest price on Apple's M4 Mac mini with a bump up to 24GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. Grab a flash deal zone before it ends tonight. The Prime Day special is in the form of a $100 instant rebate stacked with a $100 coupon discount in-cart when you shop at Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo. With the combined savings totaling $200 off, B&H's flash deal delivers the lowest M4 Mac mini price available on the upgraded spec (part number MCYT4LL/A) at $799. Save $200 on M4 Mac mini 24GB/512GB This particular model has Apple's M4 chip with a 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU. It also has 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage, both double the amount found in the standard configuration. Free standard shipping is included in the contiguous U.S. and B&H states that the deal ends tonight at 8:59 p.m. Pacific Time.
html:
Thu Jul 10 2025, 05:24 PM EDT · 1 minute read

Grab flash savings on Apple's upgraded Mac mini today only.

If you buy through our links, we may get a commission. Read our ethics policy.

B&H is ousting Amazon during Prime Day for the lowest price on Apple's M4 Mac mini with a bump up to 24GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. Grab a flash deal zone before it ends tonight.

The Prime Day special is in the form of a $100 instant rebate stacked with a $100 coupon discount in-cart when you shop at Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo. With the combined savings totaling $200 off, B&H's flash deal delivers the lowest M4 Mac mini price available on the upgraded spec (part number MCYT4LL/A) at $799.

Save $200 on M4 Mac mini 24GB/512GB

This particular model has Apple's M4 chip with a 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU. It also has 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage, both double the amount found in the standard configuration.

Free standard shipping is included in the contiguous U.S. and B&H states that the deal ends tonight at 8:59 p.m. Pacific Time.
